author: rpopma
msg: migrated the deprecated forkMode parameter to forkCount & reuseForks (http://maven.apache.org/surefire/maven-surefire-plugin/examples/fork-options-and-parallel-execution.html), added memory settings

author: rpopma
msg: performance improvement: reduce to a single sleep() long enough to trigger a rollover (speedup from 11 to 2.3 seconds)

author: rpopma
msg: performance improvement: sleep not required as rollover is size-driven (speedup of 10 seconds)
